revision.text: <onlyinclude>* '''{{LE|FakeInventory.Respawns}}''' :Preserves the item's [[action specials|Thing special]] and arguments when respawning. This property is specific to {{Class|FakeInventory}}, and not shared by other {{Class|Inventory}} subclasses, because of differences in the ways FakeInventory handles its special and arguments.</onlyinclude> [[Category:Editing references]]
